skillTree.localised_description: Dangerous predators with sharp talons and pointed beaks, these giant flying reptiles are surprisingly agile and can spot their prey at great distances.
Mighty, horned, reptilian beasts, Stegadons are naturally armoured with bony scales and spikes protruding from their crests.
Amongst the largest and most ferocious of their race, the eldest Stegadons have thicker hide and larger horns than others of their kind.
Whereby the terrain itself is both shield and weapon, enabling the Lizardmen to both mask their numbers and surprise the foe.
Some Lizardmen are able to seamlessly blend in with their jungle environment in order to observe, or defend themselves from, their enemies.
Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.
Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +5%
	(all units in army)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: It is the duty of a Skink Chief not only to obey, but also to notice and adapt.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: The Skink Chief keeps the supply lines running and sees the will of the priests done.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Some spawning are stronger and more resilient than others.
Coordinating with a team of Skinks, the Chief keeps eyes on the entire province.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +5% for armies
	(own armies in province)

Campaign line of sight: +10%
	(own characters in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Some are marked by the Old Ones for greatness.
The Slann pass their enigmatic orders to the priests, who then turn to the chiefs. The chiefs get the job done.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -4% for all buildings
	(local province)

Horde building construction cost: -4%
	(own armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
The jungle flora harbours the Lizardmen's microscopic allies in the war that never ends.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
The Jaguar God grants agility and speed.
Large, for a Skink.

skillTree.localised_description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

skillTree.localised_description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.
Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.
"What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."
"The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A skink that never gets tired or hungy.
The Lizardmen follow him and respect him.
